name: Museum of Mechanics Jam Entry: Museum of Mass Effect Minigames
name_original: Museum of Mechanics Jam Entry: Museum of Mass Effect Minigames
description:
This project is a digital museum created for the Museum of Mechanics Jam hosted by Dim Bulb Games. It recreates the mechanics of the Hacking and Bypass minigames from Mass Effect 1 and 2 (with some aesthetic liberties taken).

Known buggos: 

  • Weirdness with the circular arrow key directions in Hacking 1
  • Hacking 2 is sometimes unwinnable depending on how things spawn
